label: Color Saturation Is Complex (Others)
def_question: Is the color saturation too complex to be described as black-and-white, high, low, neutral, transitions among them, or strong contrast between saturated and desaturated areas?
alt_question: Does the video show noticeable changes in color saturation over time, shifting between high and low?
Does the video have noticeable shifts and contrasts in color saturation?
def_prompt: The color saturation is too complex to be described as black-and-white, high, low, neutral, transitions among them, or strong contrast between saturated and desaturated areas.
alt_prompt: The video shows noticeable changes in color saturation over time, shifting between high and low.
The video has noticeable shifts and contrasts in color saturation.
